title: Don’t miss it! This two-day Flash Sale gets you a lifetime license to Microsoft Office for $34.97
content:
Macworld

We all know it and love it. And sometimes, we also really need it. Microsoft Office has been around for ages, doing a tremendous job keeping up with the changing times. The apps in Microsoft Office are go-to’s for over one billion people (according to DMR) for a reason: all of the apps are user-friendly and super useful.

This deal is one to grab right away, as it’s part of a two-day Flash Sale that gets you a lifetime license to Microsoft Office Home and Business for Mac 2021 or Microsoft Office Professional 2021 for Windows for just $34.97 (reg. $219), with no coupon necessary — but they’re only available at this low price through August 13 at 11:59 p.m. PT.

This one-time purchase gets you lifetime access on one computer, unlike with Microsoft 365, which you pay monthly.

Both Windows and Mac licenses include these six Microsoft essentials to keep your professional and personal life humming along seamlessly: Word for document creation, Excel for spreadsheet management, PowerPoint for slide presentations, Outlook email access, Teams for group communication, and OneNote, which is a digital note-taking app. 

Your Microsoft Office Professional 2021 for Windows license also gets you Microsoft Publisher and Microsoft Access.

It’s important to note that Microsoft Office 2021 licenses for Mac require that customers update their OS to Version 11 Big Sur and Microsoft Office 2021 licenses for Windows require that customers update their OS to Windows 10, 11.

If you’ve been thinking about getting Microsoft Office for your Mac or Windows PC, now is the time to jump on it because this sale offers an incredibly low price for a lifetime license that includes updates.

Get a lifetime license to either Microsoft Office Home and Business for Mac 2021 or Microsoft Office Professional 2021 for Windows for just $34.97 (reg. $219) — but only through August 13 at 11:59 p.m. PT.
